title: 'Oh no, what's he done?' - Brook bowled after reverse-sweep attempt
subtitle: Nathan Lyon bowls Harry Brook for 30 runs after the England batter's attempt at a reverse sweep is missed, leaving England on 177-4 on day four of the third Ashes Test in Adelaide.
full_text: Nathan Lyon bowls Harry Brook for 30 runs after the England batter's attempt at a reverse sweep is missed, leaving England on 177-4 on day four of the third Ashes Test in Adelaide.
